attributes.action: Halt MP's wages, expenses and incomes from other sources until Brexit's decided
attributes.background: The House is deliberately taking it's time and voting for votings sake and have now handed power to the EU by showing the weak-willed and selfish natures of the current MP's. By stopping incomes until it has been decided one way or another, may just be the incentive needed to help them decide.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
